name: England
declaringWar: As our protests are in vain, we hereby declare war.
defeated: The sun sets on the empire...
introduction: Greetings. We are by the Grace of God, Victoria, Queen of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland. And soon, dare I say, the empire.
tradeRequest: Would you accept a trade agreement with England?

name: Sumer
declaringWar: The demon wants the blood of soldiers!
attacked: I will enjoy hearing your last breath as you witness the destruction of your people.
defeated: It is over. Perhaps now I shall have peace, at last.
introduction: I am Gilgamesh of Sumer and king of Uruk. Do not be afraid, I am good to my friends.
tradeRequest: What do you have to trade with, my friend?
uniques: Gifts of Gold to City-States generate [+35]% more Influence

name: China
declaringWar: I do not support of your rule, I must destroy you!
attacked: You may as well seek to conquer heaven itself. Let us see how high your arrows fly.
defeated: Even if I am defeated, my father would be proud of my actions...
introduction: I am the Yongle Emperor, friend to those who would steer their trade ships in my direction, and terrible to those who oppose me.
tradeRequest: What do you  have to trade with, my friend?
uniques: [-20]% Culture cost of adopting new Policies

name: India
declaringWar: Your territory could be much improved under Indian rule. Best I see it through.
attacked: India does not fear war. The most you can do is slow our rightful advance.
defeated: You learned my own lessons far too well. I instructed you in my own demise.
introduction: I am Chandragupta, Mauryan emperor of unified India. No, it has not gone to my head.
neutralHello: You travel near Indian territory. Why not visit and relax at our grand stepwells?
tradeRequest: Our delegation brings many gifts. Drink all the spiced buttermilk you desire! We can always send more.
uniques: [+100]% unhappiness from the number of cities

name: Rome
declaringWar: My treasury contains little and my soldiers are getting impatient... (sigh) ...therefore you must die.
attacked: Ambitious. You seek to conquer me before I move on you. I approve.
introduction: I am Caesar, destroyer of conspiracies in the Alpine woods and the Senate alike.
tradeRequest: I offer this, for your consideration.
uniques: All newly-trained [Military] units [in all cities] receive the [Legions Finest] promotion

name: Germany
declaringWar: I cannot wait until ye grow even mightier. Therefore, prepare for war!
defeated: Germany has been destroyed. I weep for the future generations.
introduction: Guten Tag. In the name of the great German people, I bid you welcome.
tradeRequest: It would be in your best interest, to carefully consider this proposal.

name: The Soviets
declaringWar: You've behaved yourself very badly, you know it. Now it's payback time.
attacked: Corrupted villain! We will bring you into the ground!
defeated: No, this is no defeat; this is but a pillar upon which the hearts of working men will gaze and be inspired; to rise up against you and topple your corrupt tyranny.
introduction: I am Vladimir Lenin and I lead a nation of working men. You will find no welcome for tyrants and merchant-lords here. All men willing to be equal, are equal in this land.
tradeRequest: How would you like it if I propose this kind of exchange?
uniques: [+20]% Production when constructing [Military] units [in all cities]

name: Scythia
declaringWar: The Empress calls for your head. You will be drowned in your own blood!
attacked: You have betrayed the trust of Tomyris and now you will pay!
defeated: The Empress falls, but I will be remembered. Will you?

name: Morocco
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We were too weak to protect ourselves...

name: Afghanistan
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.

name: Scotland
declaringWar: You shall stain this land no longer with your vileness! To arms, my countrymen - we ride to war!
attacked: Traitorous man! The Celtic peoples will not stand for such wanton abuse and slander - I shall have your head!
defeated: Vile ruler, know that you 'won' this war in name only!

name: Ghana
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: Slavery and spoliation has returned to Ghana. Were my efforts all for naught?

name: Kazakhstan
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: How could we fall to the likes of you?!

name: Aztecs
attacked: Excellent! Let the blood flow in raging torrents!
defeated: Monster! Who are you to destroy my greatness?
